entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
